ComicInfo.Characters: Witchblade [Sara Pezzini] (guest),Cannon Hawke (guest),Lara Croft [Tomb Raider] (guest),Taras (villain),Aspen Matthews,Vana (villain),Biranha (villain)

ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:59:42 [Issue ID 4000-105906] urn:comicvine:4000-105906 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:23:51. [Issue ID 239635]
ComicInfo.Summary: Vana begins the transference of power from Cannon Hawke to her damaged son Taras disfiguring Hawke badly. Lara rescues Aspen and Sara from Vana's clutches and the trio begin to plan how they will rescue Cannon.
ComicInfo.Title: Resurrection of Taras Part 2
